name: Towerino (Shibidubi Games)
description:
Show your defense skills in this mini tower defender.

Keep our enemies away from the nexus portal and fight for our kingdom, fight for Towerino.

Minimalistic art + fast paced strategy action.

Windows (PC) game powered by Unity. Download, play and share.

Director, Art and Development

Sergio Mireles

Music and Sound Composer

Manuel Lafontaine

Enemies and Towers
